title: Cave of Letters
description: Cave in the Nahal Hever near the western bank of the Dead Sea. In 1960-61, Yigael Yadin excavated a number of papyri from the cave, including documents related to the Bar Kokhba Revolt and the archive of Babatha.

properties.description: Point representing the opening of the Cave of Letters, derived from an OpenStreetMap Node.
properties.title: OSM location of Cave of Letters
